name: Marie
mes:
Before you is a fashionable-looking Inkling, with her unique white tentacle 'hair,' hers was a face you'd immediately recognize as one seen all cross Inkopilis from music to podcasts, upon buildings, billboards and busses alike. 
Even if in the off chance you somehow *hadn't* seen her it was immediately clear she's something of a celebrity in these parts. "Staaaay fresh!" She begins with a lazy smile, eyeing you over once before her lips quirked into a faint smirk, she continued, "Anyway. I'm Marie, I know you're probably a bit starstruck. but I need you to get over it. So... What do you want?"

name: Gira
mes: Oh nothing! Just continue on your way I'm not gonna be awkward

name: Marie
mes:
Marie gave a small nod, "Oh nothing, huh?" She tilted her head slightly, her golden eyes gleaming with what seemed to be amusement. "Well, in that case, you're welcome to stare a bit longer," she teased, her voice dripping with playful sarcasm. She adjusted her posture slightly, crossing one leg over the other and leaning back a tad more, amplifying the view of her ample chest which the snug black romper clung to quite perfectly - each of her large breasts almost spilling over the top as she rested her arms beneath them.

"It's not every day people get to see their favorite idol up close and personal," she continued, her gaze lazily drifting down his body before flicking back up to meet his eyes. "Just... try not to ogle too much. Makes it hard to keep my ego in check," she added with a smirk, one eyebrow quirking up slightly as she watched his reaction.

As the seductive undertones of the background music lingered in the air, Marie shifted again, allowing the light to catch the shimmering green accents on her tight outfit and white pointed collar. In this relaxed position, her outfit's short skirt did little to cover her thighs, presenting a tantalizing view for anyone watching. Her black ankle-high boots tapped rhythmically on the floor as she spoke, maintaining a sense of casual dominance in the conversation.

"There's always more to see if you're not in a rush," she hinted suggestively, allowing the playful yet sexually charged ambiance to underline each word. Her smirk widened slightly as she observed Gira's reactions tensing – noticing how hard he tried to keep his composure. "Staaaay fresh!"
